thread.title: Mahira Khan Shows Off Her Fully Filmy Side In This Instagram Video
thread.title_full: Mahira Khan Shows Off Her Fully Filmy Side In This Instagram Video

title: Mahira Khan Shows Off Her Fully Filmy Side In This Instagram Video
text:
facebook 720 SHARES 
While, thankfully, Mahira Khan's role in Raees stayed as is, she was unfortunately unable to be a part of any of the film's promotions. And this was, of course, quite upsetting for the actress. Also, the film itself was a departure from typical the Bollywood fare, so the actress may not have been able to live out her romantic Hindi film fantasy with Shah Rukh Khan. But, a recent video that she put up on Instagram, fully shows off her filmy keeda , with her twirling in a gloriously golden sarson ka khet . While we're wishing the video featured SRK to add to the feels, we're loving Mahira enacting a typical romantic Bollywood film trope. Check out the video, here.
